name: Love5
description:
Hello! This is my first game made alone for a Game Jam. It was super fun even though I was three days late to join. 

The theme was "Love", so I wanted to work with the concept of Love Languages. I believe I could work better if I had more time, but I'm happy with the result so far.

This game is still under development. I plan on fixing many things in the future. Please keep in mind that I had very little time to work and I definitely know what is missing! Thus I ask that you do not give complex feedbacks.

Thank you for checking out my game! <3
